name: bomber
content:
bomber noun [C]
(PERSON)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 a person who uses bombs: Rajiv Gandhi is believed to have been killed by a suicide bomber (= a person who carries a bomb on their body).
More examplesFewer examplesSeventeen people were killed this morning by bombers who targeted a shopping centre.Terrorist bombers attacked the hotel, causing devastation and loss of life.How did the bomber manage to get through the security barrier without being stopped?Police are searching for a bomber who planted a device under a car in Birmingham last night.Overnight, bombers attacked key targets around the city.
